security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill with no executable code. It describes a workflow for creating and sharing Claude skills via Slack integration. No security risks detected.

content.user_title: Create and Share Claude Skills with Your Team
content.value_statement: Teams struggle to share and discover Claude skills across members. This skill automates skill creation and notifies your team via Slack when new skills are ready.
actual_capabilities: Creates properly structured skill directories with required metadata
Validates skill format and naming conventions automatically
Packages skills into distributable zip files
Posts skill announcements to Slack channels via Rube
limitations: Requires Slack workspace connection through Rube
Only creates skill structure, not functional code
Needs write access to create skill directories

use_cases.title: Standardize skill creation
use_cases.description: Ensure all team-created skills follow consistent structure and metadata standards

use_cases.title: Manage skill distribution
use_cases.description: Automate skill packaging and team notifications for better skill discovery

use_cases.title: Share custom skills
use_cases.description: Build and share specialized Claude skills with immediate team visibility

best_practices: Use descriptive skill names that indicate the primary function
Include comprehensive descriptions in SKILL.md for better team understanding
Choose appropriate Slack channels for skill announcements
anti_patterns: Creating overly broad skills that try to do too many things
Sharing skills without proper documentation or examples
Ignoring naming conventions which breaks consistency

faq.question: Is this compatible with all Claude versions?
faq.answer: Yes, it creates standard skill structures compatible with Claude and Claude Code

faq.question: What are the limits on skill creation?
faq.answer: No hard limits, but follow naming conventions and keep descriptions concise

faq.question: Can I integrate with other platforms besides Slack?
faq.answer: Currently only supports Slack via Rube, but the skill structure is platform-agnostic

faq.question: Is my data safe when sharing skills?
faq.answer: Yes, only skill metadata is shared, not your actual data or usage

faq.question: Skills aren't posting to Slack, what's wrong?
faq.answer: Check your Rube connection and ensure the target Slack channel exists

faq.question: How does this compare to manual skill creation?
faq.answer: It enforces consistency, validates structure, and automates team notifications
